body:
Tested ACK again, I rebased maaku's branch and diff with btcdrak's e2b7001831cfb75e06334ba7c2cb026f8ed96434, this is correct.
For the lazy:
```
git checkout master
git pull origin master

git remote add btcdrak https://github.com/btcdrak/bitcoin
git remote add maaku https://github.com/maaku/bitcoin

git fetch btcdrak checksequenceverify
git fetch maaku checksequenceverify

git checkout -b btcdrakchecksequenceverify btcdrak/checksequenceverify
git checkout -b maakuchecksequenceverify maaku/checksequenceverify

git rebase --onto 80d1f2e48364f05b2cdf44239b3a1faa0277e58e ce15c73964b14a6ede4b713021147060b23a71e8 HEAD
#Solve by taking "Mine version"
git diff HEAD btcdrakchecksequenceverify
```
